actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Meat Inspection Act to change the ingredient requirements for meat food products subject to this act.

summary.text: Prescribes the ingredient requirements, under the Federal Meat Inspection Act, for grade 1 sausage, hamburger and ground beef, chili con carne, meat loaf, liver sausage, head cheese and sulze, blood sausage and tongue sausage. (Amends 21 U.S.C. 607)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Meat Inspection Act to change the ingredient requirements for meat food products subject to this act.
